2020 DraftKings League

Rules

  • 16-week season
  • $50 annual membership fee
  • Annual fees must be paid before 2020 NFL season kickoff
  • If the season is cancelled, members will receive a prorated refund of $3.125 per remaining week
  • Each week, win money for placing:
    • 1st - $30
    • 2nd - $15
    • 3rd - $8
  • Use only free resources for research
    See Help for a list of some free resources
  • DraftKings NFL Classic Rules & Scoring
    •

Money

The commissioner will handle collecting membership fees and distributing prize money. Use the links below to learn about accepted P2P payment services
